text: 1:12 Efesus 3:1-2; 1 Timoti 6:20; 2 Timoti 4:8; 1 Pita 4:19Kamaghɨn amizɨma kɨ osɨmtɨzir kaba atera egha aghumsɨzir puvatɨ. Kɨ, gumazir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itim, kɨ a gɨfogha gɨfa. Ezɨ kɨ fo, ingangarir a nan dafarim gatɨzir kam a deraghvɨram an ganam, egh mamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨva dughiar Krais otoghamimɨn tugham. Bizir kam bagha kɨ aghumsɨzir puvatɨ.
